Package com.bitmazk.libgdx_utils

This package shall hold useful helper classes for game development with libGDX.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonGame
    Abstract base class with commonly used attributes and methods.
    TextUtils
    Collection of methods that simplify writing text on the screen.

Package com.bitmazk.libgdx_utils Description

This package shall hold useful helper classes for game development with libGDX.

Just browse the individual class descriptions. I will try to keep things verbose and give usage examples. If anything sounds confusing, please open an issue on Github and let's try to improve the docs.
